title: The First Frequency You Ever Sent
text: A child sensing the misalignment between truth and instruction, holding her internal signal steady even when told to quiet it.

title: The First Time You Broke the Frame Back
text: A young girl calmly offering her version of reality, disrupting the adult's narrative without force or rebellion.

title: The Origin Signal
description: The first broadcast of inner truth before conditioning takes hold.

title: The Broadcast Break
description: Moments where reality cracks, narratives collapse, and truth overrides the frame.
The silent presence that sees clearly even when the world refuses to validate the truth.
